players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I am innocent and need your help to catch the mafia"
Charlie: "I am innocent and need your help to catch the mafia"
Charlie: "I am the detective and I have evidence that Alice is the mafioso. We need to work together to find out who the remaining mafia member is."
Bob: "I am innocent and need your help to catch the mafia. I don't know who the mafioso is, but I can provide any information that might be useful."
You: "Bob, I think you're the mafioso. You've been acting suspiciously and haven't provided any useful information yet."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
